title: '[FEATURE] '

---

## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem or use case this feature would solve.

**Example:**
"I often need to process CSV files where I want to group by multiple columns..."

## Proposed Solution
How would you like this feature to work?

```bash
# Example of proposed syntax/usage
lob --parse-csv '_.group_by_multi(["col1", "col2"])'
```

## Alternatives Considered
What alternatives have you considered? How do you currently work around this?

## Additional Context
- Would this be a breaking change?
- Does this exist in similar tools? (awk, jq, etc.)
- Are you willing to contribute a PR for this?

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - blocking my work
- [ ] High - would make my workflow much better
- [ ] Medium - nice to have
- [ ] Low - just an idea
